statements: SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount, products, payment_status FROM order_history;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount, order_date, products, payment_status, order_id FROM order_history;
SELECT * FROM order_history WHERE order_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM order_history WHERE payment_status = 'PAID';
SELECT customer_id, order_date, products FROM order_history WHERE total_amount > 100.00 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM order_history ORDER BY order_date ASC, total_amount DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM order_history WHERE payment_status='paid' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM order_history WHERE customer_id=1001 AND total_amount > 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, products[1] AS first_product, products[2] AS second_product, products[3] AS third_product FROM order_history WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, payment_status FROM order_history ORDER BY customer_id ASC, order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM order_items WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC, item_price DESC;
SELECT order_id, SUM(item_price * quantity) AS total_order_amount FROM order_items GROUP BY order_id;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT oi.order_item_id, oi.product_id, oi.quantity, oi.item_price, o.total_amount FROM order_items oi INNER JOIN orders o ON oi.order_id = o.order_id WHERE o.customer_id = 101 ORDER BY oi.quantity DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 102 AND total_amount < 5000 ORDER BY total_amount ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-01' ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 7
SELECT o.order_id, o.total_amount, oi.product_id, oi.item_price FROM orders o LEFT JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id WHERE oi.product_id = 201 ORDER BY o.total_amount DESC LIMIT 4
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock > 50;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC, total_amount ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_amount FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT product_name, unit_price, quantity_in_stock FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock < 10 ORDER BY unit_price
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50.00;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%333%'
SELECT product_name, unit_price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY stock_quantity ASC
SELECT customer_id, MAX(total_amount) AS max_amount FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT order_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM order_details GROUP BY order_id HAVING total_quantity > 10
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_total FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50;

SELECT customer_name, order_date, product_name, quantity FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%123%' AND customer_email IS NOT NULL;

SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.order_date, orders.order_total FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.order_total > 100 ORDER BY orders.order_date DESC;

SELECT products.product_name, products.product_category, order_items.quantity, order_items.item_price FROM products JOIN order_items ON products.product_id = order_items.product_id WHERE products.product_category = 'Electronics' AND order_items.quantity > 2 ORDER BY products.product_name ASC, order_items.quantity DESC;

SELECT orders.order_id, customers.customer_name, SUM(order_items.quantity) AS total_quantity, SUM(order_items.item_price) AS total_price FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id GROUP BY orders.order_id, customers.customer_name HAVING COUNT(order_items.product_id) > 1 ORDER BY orders.order_id DESC;
